notes: • Brand new UI, with a more modern and sleek design.
• Added themes, allowing users to customize the look of the launcher, as well as creating their own themes.
• Games has finally been added to the launcher.
• Apps and Games now have their own separate sections in the launcher.
• Added Achievements. Track your progress and accomplishments within the launcher and earn Blaze Points (BP).
• Added Emblems. Customize your launcher further by adding emblems to your launcher (unlocked via BP points or achievements).
• Added Premium Themes, which can be unlocked by spending BP points.
• Fixed a issue where the launcher would forget that a app or game was launched, resetting its stage.
• Fixed a issue where the custom themes created in My Studio would not persist through Blase updates.
